title: Textile Sample, "Ombra Dots"
medium:
Medium: linen (98%) and cotton (2%)
Technique: vertical bands of plain weave joined by long weft floats, with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 31.8 x 62.2 cm (12 1/2 x 24 1/2 in.)
description: Wide vertical bands of plain weave in off-white are joined together by long off-white weft floats. Circles in dark yellow-green, pale gold, taupe, grey, grey-green and red-brown are formed by discontinuous supplementary weft patterning. Number 416.
